text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea submontana is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea submontana". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31437A9634656. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31437A9634656.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
